item.description: An at home shootout challenge to capture some rare ice storm photos. I personally will be getting up early and headed outdoors to capture some cool sparkle and glitter. This isn't a formal event but a chance to get out there and shoot and share. Where ever you are, get outside with your camera, and take some great ice art photos. Come back here and upload some of your best frozen art.
item.name: Ice Storm Frozen Art
